channel.title: Books Dylan on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Books Dylan on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: scared
item.description: i read “dance dance dance” by murakami last night. it was pretty creepy. for some reason these books really give me the creeps. it is nuts. totally totally nuts ;). but I really liked it too. which is good. yesterday we had dylans “bachelor party.” it was pretty fun. we had a HUGE bottle of vueve and a party bus and a bunch of fancy drinks. dylan and his friends were fun.
